com.frosqh.daolibrary

Class DAO<M extends Model>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.frosqh.daolibrary.DAO<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - Class corresponding to the model treated by the DAO

    public class DAO<M extends Model>
extends java.lang.Object
    Provide necessary function to deal with database relatives to a model
    Since:
    0.1.0

      Create a new DAO based on the table name and a M object

    • Constructor Detail

      • DAO

        public DAO(java.lang.String tableName,
           M t)
    throws ConnectionNotInitException
        Create a new DAO based on the table name and a M object
        Parameters:
        tableName - Table's name in the database
        t - Object of type M, value don't matter (not null)
        Throws:
        ConnectionNotInitException - if the connection is not initialized
        Since:
        0.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public M find(int id)
        Allow to get an object linked to a certain id from the database
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier (primary key) of the object to find in the database
        Returns:
        The model referring to the given id
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • create

        public M create(M obj)
        Create an entry in the database corresponding to a model
        Parameters:
        obj - The model to add to the database
        Returns:
        The model strictly corresponding to the one saved in database (id changed)
        Since:
        0.1.0

      • update

        public M update(M obj)
        Update an entry in the database to match with the given model
        Parameters:
        obj - The model to update in the database
            Its id will be used to find the original entry
        Returns:
        The model updated such as saved in the database
        Since:
        0.1.0

            Its id will be to find the original entry

        public java.util.List<M> getList()

      • filter

        public java.util.List<M> filter(java.lang.String... args)
        Return the list of models saved in the database matching the parameters
        Parameters:
        args - list of parameters specifiyng the WHERE condition.
        For WHERE var1=val, use filter(var1,val1), and continue for more criteria
        Returns:
        A list fo model resulting of a SELECT * FROM table WHERE args

      • construct

        public static DAO construct(java.lang.Class<? extends Model> clas)
        Create a new DAO
        Parameters:
        clas - The model class the DAO should be for
        Returns:
        A new DAO initialized with the class name as tableName and the class type as generic type
